## serialization.blocks.append() function

Loads the block represented by the given state into the given workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function append(state: State, workspace: Workspace, { recordUndo }?: {
    recordUndo?: boolean;
}): Block;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | [State](./blockly.serialization_namespace.blocks_namespace.state_interface.md) | The state of a block to deserialize into the workspace. |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace_class.md) | The workspace to add the block to. |
|  { recordUndo } | { recordUndo?: boolean; } | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[Block](./blockly.block_class.md)

The block that was just loaded.
